com.ppml38.csv

Class CSVHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ppml38.csv.CSVHandler

  • public class CSVHandler
extends Object
    Class that provide different operations on csv files. Once intialised, it will form an internal table with all the values and perform the functions on RAM unless called to save. Csv.java class
    Author:
    Prakash Maria Liju P (github.com/ppml38)

    • Constructor Summary

      CSVHandler(String file, String map)
      Initialize with csv file name and map file
      CSVHandler(String file, String map, String sep)
      Initialize with a file name, map and a separator.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CSVHandler

        public CSVHandler()
        Constructor that enable to initialize with no parameters

      • CSVHandler

        public CSVHandler(String file,
                  String map,
                  String sep)
        Initialize with a file name, map and a separator. here you can provide separator other than default comma
        Parameters:
        file - Name of the file that you want to process on (Ex. "AddressFile.csv")
        map - Name of the file that contains comma separated headers (Ex. "header.txt" that contains single line as "Name,Age,Address")
        sep - Delimiter string, which can be other than comma, Note that this delimiter value will be applied to both csv and map file. This enables custom delimited files to be processed as csv.

      • CSVHandler

        public CSVHandler(String file)
        Initialize with csv file name
        Parameters:
        file - Name of the file to process on (Ex."file1.csv")

      • CSVHandler

        public CSVHandler(String file,
                  String map)
        Initialize with csv file name and map file
        Parameters:
        file - Name of the file to process on (Ex."file1.csv")
        map - Name of the file that contains headers of the csv file in single line (Ex."map1.txt")

    • Method Detail

      • getFieldNo

        public int getFieldNo(String field)
        Function that search and return the column position of given field name, from map file.
        Parameters:
        field - Name of the field that to be searched for
        Returns:
        Position of the field in map file starting from 0

      • getField

        public String getField(int row_no,
                       String field)
        Function to get value of a field present in given row
        Parameters:
        row_no - Row index starting from 0
        field - Name of the field that the value is required from
        Returns:
        Value present in the given row and column. null if value not found

      • getColumn

        public String[] getColumn(String col_name)
        Returns array of all the values in given column name
        Parameters:
        col_name - Name of the field that values required for
        Returns:
        String array of all the values present under a column

      • toString

        public static String toString(String[] fields)
        Returns row in string of comma separated values. Even the delimiter is different from comma in given file.
        Parameters:
        fields - Fields that are to be included in the string
        Returns:
        Comma separated value string

      • toString

        public static String toString(String[] fields,
                              String new_separator)
        Returns row in string of values with given string as delimiter
        Parameters:
        fields - Fields that are to be included in the string
        new_separator - Delimiter that to be used instead of comma
        Returns:
        Delimited string of values

      • add

        public void add(String s)
        Adds a new row to the csv table. New row will be added as last line
        Parameters:
        s - String of the new row to be added

      • add

        public void add(String[] s)
        Adds new rows to csv table at end of file.
        Parameters:
        s - Array of strings that are to be added

      • addFile

        public void addFile(String file)
        Append a new csv file with the existing one. All the new rows will be added at last
        Parameters:
        file - Name of the file that to be appended

      • save

        public void save(String file)
        Saves the current values with all the operations performed with delimiter as comma, without headers
        Parameters:
        file - New file name to be saved as

      • save

        public void save(String file,
                 boolean header)
        Saves the current values with all the operations performed with delimiter as comma including header
        Parameters:
        file - New file name to be saved as
        header - pass true if header to be included as first line

      • save

        public void save(String file,
                 boolean write_header,
                 String sep)
        Saves the current values with all the operations performed with delimiter as given string
        Parameters:
        file - New file name to be saved as
        write_header - If headed to be included as first line
        sep - Delimiter string instead of comma

      • getMatch

        public String getMatch(String col1,
                       String val1,
                       String col2)
        Returns the value in col2 of a row which matches col1 value = val1
        Parameters:
        col1 - Name of the column to be searched
        val1 - Name of the value to be searched
        col2 - Value of which column to be returned
        Returns:
        If no match found returns null otherwise col2 value that found
